name: Punishment of pupils limited
text:
§302A-1141    [Section effective August 1, 2016.  For section effective until July 31, 2016, see above.]  No physical punishment of any kind may be inflicted upon any pupil, except as provided for under sections 302A-1141.4 and 703-309(2). [L 1996, c 89, pt of §2; am L 2014, c 206, §3]
 
Note
 
  Use of restraint in public schools; reports to 2015-2016 legislature; update prior to 2017 legislative session.  L 2014, c 206, §§4, 5.
